content: designed in gentle shades of bernat baby blanket this cushy crochet blanket is a wonderful way to warm up baby s world the pattern works up in a snap with simple-to-learn single_crochet and chain-1 stripes crocheted pompoms are sweet to add if desired it s a fun first blanket project or a meditative choice for the more experienced maker materials bernat® baby blanket™ frosting™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m main color mc cozy rosie 61001 3 balls or 510 yds/465 m bernat® baby blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast a vanilla 04008 1 ball or 210 yds/191 m
